website_summaries.verdict: Acting as a strong and easy-to-use cleanser, this product does an impressive job clearing acne and evening skin tone.
pros: Has small, hygienic spout that makes this product easy to use in shower without letting water in
Helps to even out skin tone and reduce the appearance of acne scars
Leaves skin looking polished and clear
cons: Is best when used every other day due to strong ingredients to ensure skin doesn’t get dry

customer_reviews.title: but it is a nice gentle cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Didn't do anything to my skin, but it is a nice gentle cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: NorwayIngrid

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this.
customer_reviews.text: My friend uses this brand and her skin is flawless. I tried it and it Burned my skin. Created actual scabs. I know I have sensitive skin but I wasn’t expecting that.
customer_reviews.author: Yahnk

customer_reviews.title: Not Ideal for Dry Skin
customer_reviews.text: I have dry, acne prone skin, and I use this very rarely. Not ideal for daily use, as it can be very drying due to the salicylic acid. I would recommend using this if you have oily skin, or very sparingly if you have dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Never noticed a difference in my skin but I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Never noticed a difference in my skin but I have been struggling with acne for years.... not the product for me
customer_reviews.author: Team G

customer_reviews.title: Not safe while preggs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bc I thought the reviews said safe to use while pregnant. Most Mario badescu products are...And it’s NOT safe for pregnancy. I’ll use this after I have baby
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: I use this every day practically and have seen no ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day practically and have seen no difference in my skin. It's not fighting the acne so I'm wondering if it's just not right for my skin as my skin feels dry after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Enright

customer_reviews.title: Halfway empty product!
customer_reviews.text: 09/28/17 Received my Acne facial cleanser today. I was super excited about this product, but I am very disappointed that the bottle is only about halfway full! Not happy about this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: valeria

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't do much for my acne, it is overpriced and i did not see any noticeable changed with the reduction of my acne. I used it for a month and my acne didn't seem to have a difference. I am extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dimi

customer_reviews.title: I could not tell any difference in this vs. ...
customer_reviews.text: I could not tell any difference in this vs. any other face wash. I have now started making my own face wash that has tremendously helped fight my acne.
customer_reviews.author: Misti

customer_reviews.title: OK, but not worth price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product but seems overpriced. I think it should be about the price of a drugstore product because it seems to be of about the same quality. I do think this cleanser does its purpose yet I would not re-purchase this product because of its chemicals and high price with a medium-low quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Sally C

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure this is a knock off item because I've bought it DIRECTLY from the brand and it foamed and smelled very different.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Y. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: It feels like lotion when you're rubbing it on your face
customer_reviews.text: It feels like lotion when you're rubbing it on your face. And every time I wash it off, there's more redness on my face because of it. Save your money because I wasted mine on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: After using it for a few days, my skin dried out and broke out even more.
customer_reviews.author: fw

customer_reviews.title: Haven't noticed a change in my skin
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new facial cleanser when I stumbled upon this product. I have not yet noticed a change in my face. I did notice I broke out a little after I started using it, maybe because my skin was adapting to it? Overall it's gentle on the skin and is great for everyday use. It does have a strong herbal smell.
customer_reviews.author: Adiel N

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Did not help my acne at all.....just burned my face
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: I had heard so many good things about this and a friend sweared that it ...
customer_reviews.text: I had heard so many good things about this and a friend sweared that it helped her acne breakouts. It didn't work as well for me, it dried out my pimples but it didn't help as much as I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: bailey rahn

customer_reviews.title: not for me
customer_reviews.text: had an allergic reaction to it, maybe great for others but not me
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: within a week my face was a mess with painful breakouts and oily skin that was much worse than ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought is was controlling my oily skin and breakouts. However, within a week my face was a mess with painful breakouts and oily skin that was much worse than before I used this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J. Talbot

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Broke out after using, no refund, return window way too short
customer_reviews.author: C A

customer_reviews.title: Good basic face wash.  Gentle
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about the potency for the acne. Smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Go Lucky

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash
customer_reviews.text: I love this product line. I’ve been using it for 6 weeks along with the glycolic acid wash and the dark spots on my cheeks and forehead have dissolved almost all the way.
customer_reviews.author: DANIELLE JOSEPH

customer_reviews.title: Felt like hand soap and very drying to my skin
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this wash for years then ordered this one and it wasn't the same. Felt like hand soap and very drying to my skin. I threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: emacha

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has done wonders for my face! I also got the aloe Vera toner and acne gel. After two months my face has cleared up, redness gone. It also has prevented me from breakouts four months in to using this product. It is the real Mario badescu! Definitely recommend if you have problem skin with breakouts, redness, and my skin is dry.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Schnitker

customer_reviews.title: I normally have combo to oily skin. This facial ...
customer_reviews.text: I normally have combo to oily skin. This facial cleanser did not work well for me. Gave me break outs all over my forehead.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: It smelled a lot like alcohol which I found off-putting but something I could ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been on the hunt for a regimen to replace my current Proactiv regimen because it's just so expensive and harder to find without having to subscribe to them directly. I found this to be very harsh for my skin. It smelled a lot like alcohol which I found off-putting but something I could deal with in exchange for a good product. Unfortunately, this did nothing but clog my pores and cause me to breakout. This product definitely went back and I won't be trying it again. Looks like I'll be sticking to Proactiv for now.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy

customer_reviews.title: Fake?
customer_reviews.text: Product came unsealed. (The little baggie wasn't even ziplocked...) Trash straight away. Got my refund but honestly there is so many fake beauty products pretending to be name brands, I won't order skin care products on Amazon ever again I've seen comments of rashes and people comparing the Amazon one to one they purchased at a retailer. Theres too many fakes and I was excited to try this product and it appeared legit but since it came unsealed I'm more believing it's fake and I ordered the face cleanser through sephora for $5 more but I'm not taking chances on my face care.
customer_reviews.author: Cheshire Cat

customer_reviews.title: Aveda is better
customer_reviews.text: I still have to use another soap to get my makeup off and have my skin actually feel clean. Didn't do a thing for my breakouts. I switched to Aveda products & never looked back.
customer_reviews.author: vconquest

customer_reviews.title: causes blemishes to get worse.
customer_reviews.text: leaves, thin, unhealthy film on your faces. causes blemishes to get worse.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Levy

customer_reviews.title: This product really works!❤️
customer_reviews.text: My teenager has tried several different cleansers and acne type products - nothing worked like this does! Within just a few weeks of buying this product, her acne was cleared up( and yes, it was pretty intense acne- on her forehead, and T zone). Shes been using this for over 9 months now and no longer has ANY acne, no more outbreaks. When she does get a random pimple or two( because she slacks off usually) within a day or two she can have them disappear by washing using this product and Using the spot treatment companion product. In addition my daughter uses the hydrating spray before applying makeup- truly her skin looks great! This product really works!
customer_reviews.author: Just1

customer_reviews.title: Great for acne
customer_reviews.text: This is the best and longest lasting face cleanser I’ve purchased. It removes my makeup very well and doesn’t leave my face dry. I’ve had terrible cystic acne over the years and this has helped a ton! The bottle generally lasts me about 5 months, so the price is a bargain! It has a light scent which I love. I highly recommend for anyone struggling with acne.
customer_reviews.author: Geniusness0419

customer_reviews.title: Works for acne prone combo skin type!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use this product regularly but for whatever reason stopped. My skin recently has broken out extremely bad and I had to go back to my old routine of products. I immediately ordered this and I have to say after 4 days using it again several of my breakout clusters has already almost gone away. Highly recommend if you’re like me and suffer from breakouts and acne prone skin. I follow up with the other Mario acne products 2 week update*** Picture is before using the product 2 weeks ago and second picture is currently. I’d say it’s already working great. I suffer from severe acne and I’m glad to see any improvements!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Jo white

customer_reviews.title: WOW.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time ordering this facial cleanser. I have used other Mario Badescu products and loved them, so I gave this a try. Oh my gosh, it cleaned my skin up in such a short amount of time. I can use it daily and it doesn't irritate my sensitive skin. I am so impressed and happy I found this product!
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: This has not cleared up my acne at all and my acne isn't even that bad and I use it exactly as instructed so really disappointed because it had so many great reviews. It also is not a very good make up remover as claimed. I do like that it doesn't irritate my skin like some zit creams do, but wouldn't recommend for a face wash to remove acne.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Fake product - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This product was swapper out and refilled with something else but it is not the product that I normally buy. The consistency is not the same and the smell is not the same. It doesn't even lather on my face when I go to wash my makeup off. It feels like silicone was added or some other type of product but this is fake and buyer's beware. I should have known better than to buy this product from here!!
customer_reviews.author: Lexboogie

customer_reviews.title: The Only facewash that keeps my skin under control! Highly recommend 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Only face wash I ever use. Thankful this was available on prime during COVID!! I have problematic skin with acne flares, this is the only face wash that controls it! Use every day. Wash with warm-cold and Rinse with cold water or it will feel like your skin is irritated. Overall LOVE THIS CLEANSER! Cucumber lotion is also good, and vitamin c moisturizer and special healing powder. They all rock and keep my skin from breaking out. Thank you Mario!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my skin acne free, not irritated and smooth
customer_reviews.text: I adore this product!!! I used to use clean and clear and neutrogena products and every now and then splurged on Murad but now I see the light that is Mario B. This acne cleanser doesn’t foam up or leave you with a “squeaky clean” (which is actually over drying your skin!) feeling and that took a while get used to, but I’m so glad I got used to it! My very large pores very rarely break out now that I use this.
customer_reviews.author: samantha haynes

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Don’t let the packaging fool you. This is quite the little miracle in a bottle. After the first week of nightly washes. My daughters acne was pretty much gone. We are working on dark spots now but breakouts, not for two weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyStephens

customer_reviews.title: It works !
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product that works! Coming from someone who has had acne in their teens and mildly in adulthood! My third time ordering this product . It works and also the Glycolic wash
customer_reviews.author: Patacake Diaper Cakes

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: CAUTION: Broke my skin out in cystic acne. Read the label... do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: TheFreshFamily

customer_reviews.title: Best. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite acne cleanser ever. I’ve been on accutane for a couple of years, tried everything the dermatologist recommended for my entire teenage years, and I’m now 31 still with horrible acne. I found this stuff last year and it has honestly changed my life. The whole MB line has allowed me to be actually go 24 hours without makeup! That is beyond crazy for me, and not only has my acne reduced tremendously, but my skin is brighter and tighter. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Corrine Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Not good for daily use on sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive/combo skin and needed something to clear up some small breakouts I was having. I ended up using this 1-2x/day and it ended up making my skin extremely worse. If you can handle the ingredients in this- great! Just wasn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Has potential...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my teenage daughter. So far she has used it twice daily for 8 days, and I do see a slight improvement. She is also using the drying lotion along with the face wash. I will give it more time since I have read great reviews. I'm still hopeful it will live up to our expectations!
customer_reviews.author: ashley wilson

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me, but my cousin loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after reading rave reviews about Mario Badescu products. I have problem skin and thought "hey, what's the worst that could happen?" Apparently, the worst that could happen is my face breaking out more. However, I gave it to my cousin, and she said it changed her life. She bought a bunch of other MB products and is loving them. Seems to be about a 50/50 chance of it helping, but when it works, it really works.
customer_reviews.author: emily cox

customer_reviews.title: go-to face wash
customer_reviews.text: love this face wash! usually buy it from Urban Outfitters or Ulta but I left my bottle somewhere by accident so I quickly ordered on Amazon and had no issue!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Gregoretti

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with holes in the bottle and 1/3 gone🙄
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this cleanser forever, and while I love the cleanser itself, it arrived 1/3 gone with a hole in the bottle. If I wasn’t leaving tomorrow AM, and didn’t NEED it, I would have returned it. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin and lately with the use of the mask my skin was acne prone on my face. i started using this facewash and it has really helped me out! im not breaking out anymore, just the occasional period pimple but this wash really does the job! i love it. i combine it with the glycolic acid toner of the same brand
customer_reviews.author: Ramalfi Peña

customer_reviews.title: Bad packing, but great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand , it helps control my breakouts without drying out the skin. I just wished it would had been packed better so it wouldn’t had spilled all over. my other bottles where bubbled wrapped and did fine.
customer_reviews.author: A.P.A.L.84

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR SENSITIVE SKIN
customer_reviews.text: This may be wonderful for so many people but I got chemical burn on my face from it so I have to give it 2 stars. If you have sensitive skin do not use this. I have used many other product by them and loved it but not this one which made me really sad.
customer_reviews.author: Caylee

customer_reviews.title: NO OVERWHELMING SCENT AND GENTLE!!
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this product I was concerned about the consistency and how it would effect my skin...it was VERY GENTLE and didn't burn whatsover!! I have dry and sensitive skin so finding a product that didn't burn my skin and didn't have an overwhelming scent was a godscent! Highly reccomend if you have a similar skin type!
customer_reviews.author: destiny

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a natural replacement for my Neutrogena. Personally, the smell of this stuff was really off putting. It was very thin and never foamed up. It also broke my skin out terribly.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany L Porter

customer_reviews.title: Love this facial cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second bottle of this product and I love it. I can't say for sure that it has helped with my acne but I love it just as a face wash, which was what I was looking for in the first place. It feels gentle on my sensitive skin and the small bottle goes a long way, especially for using it about three times a day (I added a photo with my hand to scale). I use it once in the morning, once at night, and once after I workout. My sibling originally recommended that I buy this one and I'm glad they did. I would definitely re-recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT. So convenient I can order it online and not waste my time going to the store. Great quality! Will continue to use over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Love this face wash! The smell kind of reminds me of a "hospital smell" but I really don't mind because it works. I pair this with the buffering lotion and it's amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Yire A. Mendiola

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste yoooooo time 🙄
customer_reviews.text: There’s product missing and no seal on this “new bottle”. Ridiculous 🙄 now I have to waste my time with a trip to the postal office to return it. Don’t waste your time buying this it’s a gamble on whether or not you’re going to get a legit bottle.
customer_reviews.author: C Gandara

customer_reviews.title: Bought several time!!! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cleanser. I’ve bought it several times. Not because it ran our but because they keep on taking it at the airport 😭😭😭 Best cleanser ever. I have oily/combo skin and I breakout when I don’t use the right cleanser. It also took care of my hyperpigmentation
customer_reviews.author: KEKE

customer_reviews.title: Good skincare line
customer_reviews.text: Stopped using proactive because it was pricey and didnt work well, heard nothing but good things about 5this skincare line and do far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping my acne gets better but not only it didn’t get rid of my acne but it made my face more break out. I’m disappointed and wonder why the review is so good.
customer_reviews.author: A certain buyer

customer_reviews.title: The truth
customer_reviews.text: This helps my acne on the daily! It smells like rubbing alcohol, but it is not a bad smell! It smells clean! It makes your skin smooth after! This product is better with people with oily skin b/c it will dry up your pimples! Might take you 3+ days to adjust to the product! But I’m absolutely in love with it and have gone through 3 bottles of it!
customer_reviews.author: reifsçchneider

customer_reviews.title: Not really beneficial for my acne
customer_reviews.text: I have used almost two bottles of this product and I haven't really seen any outstanding results in my skin. I don't know if it's just me (I have had pretty problematic, acne-prone skin) but this just doesn't seem to help with acne, maybe just cleansing your face in general.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for combo skin.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only cleanser that works on my acne. I have combination skin & it can get very oily. I use this plus a non-alcohol witch hazel toner and they go perfect together.
customer_reviews.author: sydneymw

customer_reviews.title: Your face will thank you
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY face wash that has so consistently kept me from breaking out for nearly a year now. I think the biggest trick is to follow the instruction on the bottle to leave it on for a couple minutes before washing off. A little goes a long way, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: COUNTERFEIT PRODUCT DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this cleanser from ulta several times. This one is not the same. It feels like I'm washing my face with nothing. It has a different smell too. I was able to get a refund tho. The real cleanser is great.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING face wash
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this face wash- I use it every night and it works very well. Although I highly recommend you order this with the Mario Badescu drying if you want super clear results. The drying lotion works over night with extremely noticeable results! Don't know what i would do without it.
customer_reviews.author: seabrook c kelley

customer_reviews.title: Not super effective but that is my personal experience
customer_reviews.text: Not super effective but that is my personal experience. But you can't expect a cleanser to completely remove your acne. I believe you have to address the problems going on internally. But it doesn't over dry my skin so that's nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Wasnt the same product . I purchased a mini version of this at ulta since i had recieved a gift card for amazon i thought to purchase the larger version on here since i loved the mini one. Wasnt the same product it gave off a alcohol smell. The original had no sent and the consistency wasnt the same also. I broke out instantly after using this it was horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Yang

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cleanser for the past year and it is so nice. It feels nice on the skin. It smells so good but the smell is very faint and isn't overwhelmingly perfumed. It feels like it is truly cleaning my skin. In general I love Mario Badescu products.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: good cleanser but a little drying
customer_reviews.text: My skin is combo skin and during the winter I get super dry skin and bad acne. This along with the drying cream has helped made my acne manageable. It doesn't clear your skin (I've used it for 2 months so who knows, maybe) but it smells good and it's not harsh on your face at all. As all acne cleansers are though, it does dry out my face.
customer_reviews.author: Melaina

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin
customer_reviews.text: Great for skin, just not for sensitive skin. Made me break out but made my husbands skin clear up
customer_reviews.author: Alexis King

customer_reviews.title: Not good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This irritated my sensitive skin to the point that after only a few uses I gave it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: BOO BOO
customer_reviews.text: BOO BOO!! This didn’t work at all for me. Made me break out more along with all the acne products they have. People literally get this for the hype and I fell for it
customer_reviews.author: Alina A.

customer_reviews.title: Go to face wash
customer_reviews.text: Has been my favorite face wash for years. I love this stuff. Sensitive on skin and eyes if it gets in them. Smells and tastes good if you accidentally get it in your mouth. Doesn’t really lather, which I like cause I feel like it doesn’t dry my skin out as much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders! I have combination skin. Never leaves my skin feeling too dry or too oily. No complaints at all
customer_reviews.author: Aneshia Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product... this is just one of my skin care regimen in the evening. I have bought this twice already. It is gentle in your skin and smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: Smoot n supple
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and have been using this for awhile. I can say that my face never looked better and I am not paid to say that. I purchased with my money
customer_reviews.author: Meg Davis

customer_reviews.title: Quite Drying, Basic Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: It didn't do anything that noticeable. It's just a cleanser. Removes dirt and oil, that's about it. Not moistrizing
customer_reviews.author: Julien

customer_reviews.title: Gentle face wash
customer_reviews.text: I used this face wash for a long time. I liked how gentle it was on my skin. I definitely recommend if you are trying to fix problem skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Just get it
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this stuff. All Mario Badescu products are my favorite. I get compliments on my skin all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Made me break out
customer_reviews.text: This has fragrance in it, and that usually makes my face break out. I don’t recommend it if you have sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: olivia

customer_reviews.title: Clean Face Less Acne
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my face feeling clean and removes all makeup and grime from the day. Keeps my skin clear from acne!
customer_reviews.author: Heels and High Gloss

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and have went through so many facial products and when I use this one, it has changed my life completely. I use it with my Clarisonic spin brush amazing, my acne has cleared my dark marks are fading away. It doesn’t feel sticky or leave residue I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Pashira A

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cleanser for 7 years. It cleaned my skin up really well. I do not have oily skin. My skin is average to dry. It’s extremely gentle. It does not foam or get sudsy at all. It leaves your skin very soft and moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: ... use for very sensitive skin unless you have a great moisturizer for your face already
customer_reviews.text: Do not use for very sensitive skin unless you have a great moisturizer for your face already.
customer_reviews.author: Pooh

customer_reviews.title: Will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Product works perfectly for my skin. It leaves me with a hydrated feeling and will continue to purchase. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MuhicFam

customer_reviews.title: My go-to face wash!
customer_reviews.text: Love this face wash! It is the only face wash I have used that my face does not get SUPER red with and still manages to help with my acne! Plus, Amazon has it for a great price that ships directly to my door! What’s not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lizdas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Changed my skin!!! I have had acne basically my whole life and this stuff has cleared my skin better than anything I've ever tried.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Rogers

customer_reviews.title: average
customer_reviews.text: Pretty average acne wash. I don't think it's really any better than some drugstore brands even though I am usually a fan of mario badescu products. It kept my skin clear EXCEPT for hormonal breakouts and I need a cleanser that will help combat that. I used this for about a year and didn't realize how unhappy I was with this cleanser until I tried something new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have sensitive skin, but this wa as fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Cammie Hill

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This caused more of a breakout. Unhappy and wasted money
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wont work in acne problems.
customer_reviews.text: It was opened when it arrived. The product works like a soup but for acne I wont recommend. If you have acne problems choose another one.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: beware
customer_reviews.text: I think this is counterfeit. Sent back the first but the second was the same.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gift For You

customer_reviews.title: Very Effectiv3 Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This product was very harsh on my skin. I am going to try it again and dilute it with water. Thanks for your prompt delivery and service.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My gf bought it for herself. I have horrible acne nothing seems to work. I gave it shot thinking whats the worse that could happen. after a week I noticed my face was clearing up! A week after that it just looked even better! I am planning on making this my primary face wash for now on!
customer_reviews.author: Mario marroquin

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: Best facial cleaner. 14 yr old son used it for a few weeks and almost of his acne and Blackheads cleared right up.
customer_reviews.author: dabug97

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this facial cleanser! It makes my face so soft and my skin hasn't gotten any worse since using it, so that's definitely a good thing! Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my Holy Grail face wash! Keeps my face clear
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best facial cleansing product ever.... I works well on my Melanin skin. I often use it with Cetaphil as well. Perfect to keep the breakouts away.
customer_reviews.author: MizzKeyz

customer_reviews.title: Super effective!
customer_reviews.text: You can definitely find this cheaper at Ulta or other places like that! But the overall product is great. I have adult acne and this helps me so much. Controls my oil and keeps my skin clear of breakouts. I’ve been using it for a about a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Leigh Gibson

customer_reviews.title: I Reccomend!
customer_reviews.text: I havent had any big breakouts at all. I also use this every day. Although its a bit drying apply some moisturizer after and you're all set. This washes off all my makeup in one go. For extra cleanse i use this to fully cleanse after washing off my makeup. Why didn't anyone tell me of this product before?!
customer_reviews.author: Yajksarah

customer_reviews.title: better than ulta!
customer_reviews.text: the only cleanser that works for me!! this makes it arrive faster and cheaper than ulta!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not interested
customer_reviews.text: It was already open & it hurts my face when using it
customer_reviews.author: Amber Nicole
